title.rendered: STEDI SURFACE SINGLE WHITE MARINE LED ROCK LIGHT | MARINE WHITE

content.rendered:
High Performance LED Rock Lights.

LED ROCK LIGHTS 1 PIECE PACKAGE

DETAILS

STEDI High Powered 5700K Single unit LED rock Lights. Compared to our RGB rock lights, these offer significantly higher performance.

APPLICATION 

  • Engine Bay Lights
  • Rock Crawling Light
  • Reverse Assist Lights
  • On Deck or Side Rail Lights for Marine
  • Rear Cargo or Canopy Lights

KEY TECHNICAL DETAILS 

  • Abrasion Resistant Lens and Finish
  • IP69K Standard
  • Environmentally sealed automotive connectors
  • High-Performance CREE LEDs
  • 50,000 hours Lifespan
  • 2 Year Warranty
  • Rubber Mounting Base
  • The cable can exit from rear or side.

SPECIFICATIONS

HOUSING MATERIAL Aluminium
LED CREE LED
COMPATIBLE VOLTAGE 12v DC
LIFESPAN 50,000hours
LUMEN 813Lm (each)
BEAM ANGLE 120 Degrees
CONNECTOR TYPE Sealed
AMPERES 0.4a @ 13.6v (each)
CERTIFICATION CE, E4, RoHs, R87, IP69K

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x STEDI LED Rock Light | Marine White
  • 1 Rubber Pad with Stainless Screws & Bolts

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI SURFACE SINGLE WHITE MARINE LED ROCK LIGHT | MARINE WHITE

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
